title: Review Pre-Implementation Controls for a New System
description: An IT auditor reviews a new software system before it goes live to ensure adequate controls are built in.

tasks.description: Review the system's design documents to understand the planned control features, such as audit trails and role-based access.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor understands the intended control design.

tasks.description: Interview the development team to discuss how segregation of duties will be enforced within the application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor assesses the planned approach for segregation of duties.

tasks.description: Recommend adding a control to require manager approval for any transactions over $10,000 before the system goes live.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor identifies a missing control and recommends its inclusion before launch.
